title: Building.And.Co
description:
Building & Co: You are the architect! (c) Elektrogames

10/2008 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Solidshield
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Simulator

Building & Co is a revolutionary city builder in which you will deal with
all the aspects that come into play during the management of a real
building site. You must consider the specifications, the budget, and
technical constraints as well as delivery timeframes in order to be able to
build numerous ambitious buildings.

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content located in the /Crack dir on the disc to
your installation directory.
